Social dog walking app

An app concept for tracking your dog's walks, with collar geo location to measure your dog's covered distance and proximity to you. This is a continuation of the concept from Daily UI 19, a leader board UI design that 'Gamifies' dog walking to keep dog owners engaged and incentivised to walk their dogs. üê∂ @Daily UI

ECommerce dashboard

An eCommerce analytics UI design for @Daily UI 18. Having experience running an eCommerce store, I took this opportunity to design my ideal analytics page. I used horizontal and vertical grids to try and fit in as much information as I could whilst still letting it breath. üôÇ
